name: Baa Baa Bop
description:
Controls:   Mouse OR Touchscreen.

Knock enemies out of bounds by throwing yourself them. Every attack is also a risk. The full game would feature tons of levels, puzzles and fun physics, characters and beautiful artwork.

But in order to do that I need support, I work full time and so I can only work on this on the side, so I need to know if it's worth pursuing, I want your feedback and your ideas. What should the next step of this journey be?
